changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

guides/frontend.title: Frontend (React & Next.js) Guide
guides/frontend.description: Architect Linter Pro is highly effective for modern frontend applications (React, Next.js, Vue, Angular) where component coupling can quickly become unmanageable.

guides/go.title: Go (Standard & Frameworks) Guide
guides/go.description: Architect Linter Pro supports Go codebases, focusing on package organization and dependency management.

guides/java.title: Java (Spring Boot) Guide
guides/java.description: Architect Linter Pro brings enterprise-grade architecture linting to Java applications, with specialized support for Spring Boot.

guides/laravel.title: Laravel (PHP) Guide
guides/laravel.description: Architect Linter Pro supports PHP and is perfectly suited for Laravel projects, helping you maintain a clean separation between Controllers, Models, and Services.

guides/nestjs.title: NestJS Integration Guide
guides/nestjs.description: NestJS is one of the most popular frameworks for building scalable server-side applications with Node.js. Its modular architecture makes it a perfect fit for Architect Linter Pro.

guides/python.title: Python (Django & FastAPI) Guide
guides/python.description: Architect Linter Pro provides native support for Python using Tree-sitter, allowing you to enforce architecture in Django, FastAPI, and Flask projects.

intro.title: Architect Linter Pro
intro.description: A multi-language software architecture linter written in Rust that validates architectural rules through a dynamic rule engine. Supports 10 languages (TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, PHP, Java, C#, Ruby, Kotlin, and Rust) using Tree-sitter for fast and accurate parsing. It ensures that the software design (Hexagonal, Clean, MVC, etc.) is respected regardless of who writes the code.

reference/api.title: API & CLI Reference
reference/api.description: Architect Linter Pro is designed to be used both as an interactive tool and as part of an automated pipeline.

technical/performance.title: Performance Guide
technical/performance.description: This guide provides comprehensive information about optimizing your architect-linter-pro setup for maximum performance.

technical/testing-guide.title: Testing Guide
technical/testing-guide.description: This guide provides comprehensive information on running, writing, and understanding tests for the architect-linter-pro project.
